author: Rublex
post_text: November 8, 2014 at 2:17 PM#1HiHow can i create a macro that has fade time when i stomp the effect?I use the predefined macro "stomp effects", But i want it to fade out, not clip.Anyone?

posts.author: Rublex
posts.post_text: November 8, 2014 at 2:17 PM#1HiHow can i create a macro that has fade time when i stomp the effect?I use the predefined macro "stomp effects", But i want it to fade out, not clip.Anyone?

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: November 9, 2014 at 11:30 PM#2Stomp should obey Program Time so something like this might do the jobSpecialMaster 2."program time" At 5On SpecialMaster 2."program time"Stomp ..........Off SpecialMaster 2."program time"

posts.author: sebmdp
posts.post_text: November 10, 2014 at 2:34 PM#3Hi,If your effect has been assigned to an executor you can assign an off time to this executor.There is a built in macro into the predefined macros to do that quickly.Hope this help

title: Stomp effect fade
